title: Junk Spam Storage
content:
What happens when an email is downloaded but the settings have been changed to send a spam/junk email to a folder that does not exist.

When I Alt/click an email, the alt/click menu allows you to mark it as Junk. I have just set the junk option in settings (Global) to move junk mail to the Junk folder but the Gmail account does not have a Junk folder, only a Spam Folder.

Why do people use such unprofessional terms? It is Spam. Even "Folder" is childish to someone who started with Dos 5.0 although it is sort of correct.

I have also adjusted the notifications so I do see a quick notification about receipt of an email. I saw a notification that mentioned an email that was considered junk. I cannot find it. I do not know for sure whether it was junk or not.

Where could this email have gone? Gone forever? I have nothing set to totally remove emails. I do this manually. Emails caught by my Filters are sent to the Bin/Trash (another mix) so I can check them before deleting permanently.

Regarding the Bin/Trash mix mentioned, I have 4 accounts showing. An old IP based and a Gmail based account for both myself and my partner. My partner is not interested in using computers. My Gmail account has a Bin folder but the other 3 have Trash folders, all with bin icons. I have no idea about setting icons for these folders, nor do I care about this, meaning I don't think it is something I have done deliberately. I just find it weird and confusing that there is no convention followed.
creator: Oldneweng

title: Moving my archived messages to external storage
content:
I am using Thunderbird 128.0 under Windows 10. I routinely archive old emails, with the archives stored in my local Thunderbird folders.

I'd like to periodically delete the older archives, but to keep some sort of backup copy. Is there any way I can copy or export the archive folders to somewhere else, such as another folder on my computer or an external drive?

And if I succeed in doing this, will it be possible to search the copy, and to restore individual messages if necessary?

Thanks in advance for any help.

Mike

title: Emailversand funktioniert nur teilweise

Ständig über den ganzen Tag verteilt bekomme ich von thunderbird eine meldung: unable to send Message. Das hört gar nicht auf. Teilweise kommen die Emails an und dann wieder nicht. Die nachricht -unable to .... kommt aber trotzdem immer. Bitte um hilfe. Mfg Daniela

title: Mail verzenden
content:
Sinds 15 of 16 oktober (nieuwe update?): Thunderbird programma werkt (bijna) goed. Mail opstellen werkt goed. Maar ..... er wordt geen mogelijkheid meer geboden om de opgestelde mail te verzenden!! Kan nergens op verzenden of iets dergelijks drukken. Wel werkt: vet-cursief, vergroten en verkleinen letter, smiley en meer zaken worden wel weergegeven maar spelling bijvoorbeeld weer niet. Ik zit er goed mee om het hand. Ik hoop op spoedig oplossing.

Met vriendelijke groet;

title: Trouble when setting up a complementary email account.
content:
I have moved to Thunderbird from Microsoft Outlook as my email manager. The domain "asetradius.es" is hosted in Spanish company Dinahosting. My intention was to use two accounts, one for each of y maina ctivities, with different identities and signature dress, namely mariodeeechevarria@asetradius.es for legal translation and iahoy@setradius.es for AI commercial activities. However, upon creating the second account, Thunderbird automatically copied the settings of the original, main account, resulting in my emails for my legal translation business now coming out with the signature dress of my AI business. When I try to add the original account mariodeechevarria@asetradius.es as a new, different account, Thunderbird encounters a confluict (I suspect a duplicate) and gives error. How do I go about this in my account settings, so that I can see and manage both accounts, and the emails sent from each wear their appropriate signature dress?

Thanks,

Mario

title: Okno „Napsat“
content:
Dobrý den, 

  PC  W10 64bit,  Thunderbird 144.0.1  (64bit).

Cca před měsícem mi při pokusu napsat email, čili „tlačítko Napsat“, se objeví pouze malé okno a v něm zcela chybí hlavně tlačítka „Poslat“ a „Připojit soubor“. Pomocí klávesových zkratek lze mail napsat i poslat. Ovšem tím zmizí „myší komfort“. Nejsem si vědom nějakého mého nevhodného zásahu (klasická uživatelská odpověď, že). V nápovědě jsem nenašel způsob jak to vrátit zpět, to samozřejmě neznamená, že to tam není, ale hledám a nenalézám. Je nějaká možnost návratu do původního vzhledu okénka „Napsat“? 

  K osmdesátým narozeninám jsem dostal PC s W11 (64bit) a chtěl bych pomocí prográmku

„Backup Thunderbird“ přenést data z původního PC, ale obávám se, že by se mi přeneslo i nežádoucí nastavení okénka „Napsat“ do nového PC. Prosím o pochopení, jsem jen uživatel a v mém věku už mi to asi tolik nepálí. Děkuji za odpověď. Zdraví J. Krist
creator: jirkakri

title: I'm locked out of my primary gmail account on Thunderbird
content: I have been using Thunderbird on my computer for many years to handle my several gmail accounts. For the past few days I have been locked out of my main account - wbbtov@gmail.com - and have not received any emails since 15.28 on 14th October. emails are still coming through to that account on my mobile phone, but not to my computer (Windows 10). When I open Thunderbird on my computer, I get a message in a black box saying 'Thunderbird. Authentification failure while connecting to server imap.gmail.com.' I have reset my Google password for wbbtov@gmail.com via Google (it took 2 days) andf have entered the new password in the Thunderbird settings menu for the account and the imap setting, but cannot for the smtp setting, which remains that generated for the old password when I set up the account on Thunderbird. Can you please reactivate my wbbtov account? Thank you fort anything you can suggest. WB

title: Can't log into Yahoo Mail anymore - Something went wrong. We could not sign you in. Try again from a different device.
content:
Until yesterday, I had no issues accessing my Yahoo account. However, all of a sudden, the Yahoo login popup has started appearing.

After entering the password, I get the error: "Something went wrong. We could not sign you in. Try again from a different device."

I checked and tried following:

  • The authentication method is set to OAuth2.
  • Cookies are enabled in settings
  • Tried Yahoo account password and app one time password
  • Deleted account in Thunderbird and created from scratch. The same login popup appears but fails the same.
  • Deleted all cookies from yahoo in the "Show cookies" dialog in the setting.

Any help is appreciated.
creator: nharrer

title: Mail nelle cartelle Locali illeggibili
content:
Buongiorno a tutti, scrivo dopo aver cercato sul forum, ma probabilmente per inesperienza non riesco a trovare una soluzione. Chiedo quindi aiuto a voi.

Nel tempo ho spostato le mail dal server alle cartelle locali. Le cartelle locali sono state archiviate anziché sul percorso di default, su un NAS aziendale. Da qualche tempo però quando accedo alle cartelle locali trovo tutte le email spostate nel tempo ma quando voglio visualizzarle non vedo il messaggio.

Ho provato a cercare qui sul forum ed ho già fatto i seguenti passaggi senza risolvere nulla: - riparazione della cartella tramite thunderbird; - cancellazione del file *.msf.

Potete aiutarmi in qualche modo?

Vi ringrazio in anticipo

title: [URGENT] Signature disappears when adding recipient (No recent changes in settings)
content:
Hello everyone,

I have been using Thunderbird for many years and have never experienced the following issue until now, despite not having made any conscious changes to my configuration:

The Problem:

When I click "Write" (or "Compose") a new email, the HTML/Text signature (assigned to my account) appears correctly in the message body.

The moment I add the recipient's email address in the "To" field (either by typing it or selecting it from autocomplete/address book), the signature instantly disappears from the message body.

Important Details:

Previous behavior: This never used to happen; the signature always remained.

No changes made: I have not intentionally modified the signature, identity, or account settings recently.

Signature type: The signature is configured via the account options (using HTML/local file/or plain text, depending on the test).

Email format: Composition is set to HTML.
creator: byjgsoro

title: Adding accounts crashes Thunderbird - every time
content:
Hi guys,

I'll try to remain calm.

After trying around 20 different email apps to find one that does what I want (which isn't much anyway), I thought I'd try Thunderbird. I had used it many years ago and it was great. Not any more.

Every time I try to add an email account, it crashes. Here's what I've tried to fix it:

Disabled the Account Hub Started Thunderbird in Safe Mode Started Thunderbird in Troubleshoot Mode Created a new Thunderbird profile Checked the antivirus and firewall Gave Thunderbird permission to accept incoming connections Reinstalled Thunderbird twice Tried to manually set up the account offline Disabled hardware acceleration Forced the Profile Manager Manually removed the Account Hub entry from pref.js file Unchecked Thunderbird's access to Mac Contacts MacOS is up to date Created new user on Mac and started with clean install and obviously clean everything - it crashed.

No other mail program fails so spectacularly as Thunderbird. Has anyone got any idea as to what is going on.

Thanks,

Jimmy.
creator: jimmy16

title: Thunderbird 140.2.1esr (64-bit) problems in Windows 11 25H2
content:
Since the version 140.2.0esr (64-bit) in Windows 11 (24H2, and next 25H2), Thunderbird shows several problems, and the version 140.2.1esr did not resolve any issues. Thunderbird (version 140.2.0esr) stopped downloading emails, and stopped filtering incoming emails automatically. These problems have never occurred in previous versions of Thunderbird.

After being launched or after a check mail click, Thunderbird usually displays the following error message: "Unable to write the email to the mailbox. Make sure the file system allows you write privileges, and you have enough disk place to copy the mailbox."

I have done all the required checkings, I have removed the file "global-messages-db.sqlite" and re-opened Thunderbird but nothing worked better. So I stress that this error message is wrong because there is plenty of free space on the SSD disk and the accessed files have 'full control' privilege for the system and for the current user.

After a while, new emails are finally downloaded and written to the Input folder: this proves that write privileges are correct and that there is enough free space on the disk. However they come late in time and some emails are downloaded duplicated.

Most often incoming emails are not filtered automatically, and I receive the following error message: "Error - xxx/yyy on Local Folders. The messages could not be filtered to folder 'xxx/yyy on Local Folders' because adding a message to it failed. Verify that the folder is displaying properly or try to repair it from the folder properties". This issue occurs although the folder xxx/yyy displays correctly and repair operations have been performed. On the contrary the same filters works quite fine when I run them manually from the Thunderbird menu =>Tools>Messages Filters (selecting all filters, clicking Run Now).

Within the Local Folders, the folders and subfolders containing new emails are no more highlighted with their name written in bold character font. The subfolder is only highlighted after it has been opened by the user. A very serious consequence is that the user may have missed important new emails, unless he opens the Activity Manager to see the list of new emails.

Sometimes when Thunderbird opens I get the message: "Error - Inbox on xxx@yyy. Unable to open the folder Inbox on xxx@yyy because it is in use by some other operation. Please wait for that operation to finish and then select the folder again". This message was never displayed by previous versions of Thunderbird.
creator: nibg06

title: Limitare sincronizzazione posta inviata per nuovo account
content: Salve, il mio problema è questo. Ho installato Thunderbird e aggiunto un nuovo account di posta. Durante la configurazione ho scelto l'opzione "Limita sincronizzazione cartelle a" 90 giorni. Tuttavia, appena creato l'account, Thunderbird scarica completamente le intestazioni dei messaggi in "posta inviata" di tutti quelli presenti sul server (sono circa 10 anni storici, oltre 10.000 messaggi). In posta in arrivo invece la sincronizzazione è corretta. Ho ritentato con un diverso account di posta, e il risultato è lo stesso. Migliaia e migliaia di messaggi scaricati nonostante la sincronizzazione sia impostata a 30 giorni. Non desidero scaricare 10 anni di posta inviata sul mio PC, che cosa sto sbagliando nelle opzioni di sincronizzazione? Grazie. Andrea

title: Signature disappears after entering recipient in TO: field
content:
I have a Mac running the latest version of Sequoia and Thunderbird up to date with 140.4.0esr. I have two email accounts. One uses signature text that is entered in Account Settings. The other uses a signature from a file. Boxes are checked for Include signatures for replies and forwards.

The issue: When creating, forwarding or replying to an email from either account, it initially inserts the correct signature and looks just fine. But after entering the recipient in the To field, the signature immediately disappears. It happens whether the recipient address is one of my contacts, or is a totally made-up address.

I first noticed this happening yesterday. Very strange and very frustrating. Hope I gave you all the details, but let me know on any questions. Thanks for your help!!

title: eliminazione posta in arrivo imap aruba
content:
Salve, Ho recentemente effettuato una migrazione da un account configurato in POP con (Outlook) a uno in IMAP utilizzando Webmail di Aruba. Vorrei configurare Thunderbird con la configurazione IMAP, ho impostato tutto e la configurazione sembra corretta e inizialmente riesco a visualizzare tutte le email senza problemi. Tuttavia, dopo pochi secondi, solo i messaggi presenti nella posta in arrivo vengono eliminati dal server di Aruba in modo automatico.

Potrei gentilmente avere indicazioni su come risolvere questo problema o su eventuali impostazioni da verificare per evitare che le email vengano eliminate dal server?

Grazie mille per l’attenzione e per il supporto.

Cordiali saluti, grazie mille

title: How to completely delete Thunderbird?
content:
I would like to delete Thunderbird completely from my accout and then re-install fresh. However none of the answers I have found tell me where to start to delete it from my profile.

The online info is inaccurate as it pre-supposes a certain knowledge as to what is to be found where. I cannot follow that.
creator: arapacis24

title: iCloud Requesting Signon
content: iCloud email seemed to be working for a while, but a few days ago it no longer showed me iCloud mail, but instead, keeps popping up a TB request to sign in to iCloud: https://p46-contacts.icloud.com is requesting your username and password.' I don't really use iCloud mail, so I removed it completely from Accounts in TB, yet this message keeps coming up. If I supply the correct info, it still will come up after 5 minutes or so. What can I do? Thanks, John
creator: radiowhiz

title: "Important" and "All Mail" headings for messages
content: What do the message headings "All Mail" and "Important" mean on my Thunderbird page? I can't see any use for these headings and would like to erase them.
creator: tastokka

title: won't delete
content:
I was trying to delete many hundreds of old emails and highlighted many that were unread at a time. (Shift, select emails and shift on the last one). They highlighted in blue. When I clicked on "delete," the blue highlight turned gray and nothing happened. Now I can't even go back in and delete them one at a time.

Is there a limit to the number of emails I can delete in one group? How can I delete the ones that are now gray (instead of bold black showing unread)?

I hope this makes sense. Thank you for any assistance you can provide!
creator: esnedeker
